plot: It's a miserable rainy day. John bangs on the door of his home, trying desperately to make his wife open the door before she does something she may regret.
title: Lullaby
plot_es: It's a miserable rainy day. John bangs on the door of his home, trying desperately to make his wife open the door before she does something she may regret.
plot_en: It's a miserable rainy day. John bangs on the door of his home, trying desperately to make his wife open the door before she does something she may regret.
